1.title: Bongfish Enters the Big League
1.plot: In the highly competitive world of video game development, a small studio is offered the opportunity of a lifetime - to make an XBLA Kinect game based on the action sport, Ice Cross Downhill. Will the Bongfish team be able to navigate this pressure-filled industry and the additional challenges that come with playing in the big leagues?

2.title: The Journey Begins
2.plot: The development process is under way as the Bongfish team begins to tackle the fourteen milestones necessary to complete the game. After an important submission, Michael and his crew travel to an actual ice track to try out the sport for themselves. But building the controls proves to be a bigger challenge than expected.

3.title: Bugging Out
3.plot: Now a month behind schedule, the team is scrambling to finish the 'Vertical Slice' submission - their biggest milestone yet. But two bugs have reared their heads and the deadline is in jeopardy. Although it is a stressful time in the studio, Michael must travel to San Francisco to attend The Developer's Conference where he hopes to find an animation partner for the game.

4.title: Quebec Bound
4.plot: After failing the Vertical Slice milestone, the conflict between Michael and Serkan grows. The team must find a way to resolve the issues and resubmit. Michael and Ali travel to Quebec, home of the Red Bull Crashed Ice finals to present a demo version of the game to the sport's creators. With so much at stake, will Bongfish rise to the challenge?

5.title: Under Pressure
5.plot: The Bongfish team faces their biggest challenge to date. At the same time as the 'Content Complete' milestone is due, they must deliver a separate game build for the first public showing of Red Bull Crashed Ice Kinect at PAX Prime in Seattle. The team members struggle as the pressure mounts.

6.title: Rising to the Occasion
6.plot: After struggling to meet deadlines along the way, the Bongfish team is far behind schedule and the final submission deadline is fast approaching. The team now has only one chance to pass their final milestone - a daunting task that only a handful of studios have ever accomplished. Michael and Robin clash as Michael tries to make changes to the game at such a late stage.

imdb.plot outline: The annual turnover of the worldwide video and computer games industry amounts to over $40 billion - more than the film industry. But does anyone know the producers in this field? This is what new series 'Game Quest' is all about. In eight episodes, the documentary series look behind the scenes of the production of tomorrow's next multi-player hit. The creative crew painstakingly develop the game with groundbreaking technologies against budget constraint and challenging deadlines.
imdb.title: Game Quest
plot: The annual turnover of the worldwide video and computer games industry amounts to over $40 billion - more than the film industry. But does anyone know the producers in this field? This is what new series '_Game Quest_ (qv)' is all about. In eight episodes, the documentary series look behind the scenes of the production of tomorrow's next multi-player hit. The creative crew painstakingly develop the game with groundbreaking technologies against budget constraint and challenging deadlines.::Christiane Kretzer
